statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceResponses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT response_text, predicted_sentiment FROM CustomerServiceResponses WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM CustomerServiceResponses WHERE predicted_sentiment > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceResponses WHERE predicted_sentiment BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(predicted_sentiment) AS max_sentiment FROM CustomerServiceResponses GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceResponses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, response_text FROM CustomerServiceResponses WHERE predicted_sentiment > 0.5 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, predicted_sentiment FROM CustomerServiceResponses WHERE customer_id = 5 AND predicted_sentiment < 0.5 ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM CustomerServiceResponses GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_responses > 2;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(predicted_sentiment) AS avg_sentiment FROM CustomerServiceResponses GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_sentiment DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_service_responses;
SELECT response_text, customer_id FROM customer_service_responses WHERE prediction_score > 0.5;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, response_text FROM customer_service_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, predicted_response_probability FROM predictive_analytics WHERE prediction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, prediction_score FROM customer_service_responses ORDER BY prediction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_service_responses WHERE prediction_score > 0.5 ORDER BY response_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, response_text FROM customer_service_responses WHERE prediction_score < 0.3 ORDER BY response_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT response_text, prediction_score FROM customer_service_responses WHERE customer_id = 1234 ORDER BY prediction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_service_responses JOIN predictive_analytics ON customer_service_responses.customer_id = predictive_analytics.customer_id WHERE customer_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM predictive_analytics WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY predicted_response_probability DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_service_responses
SELECT response_text, prediction_score FROM customer_service_responses WHERE customer_id = 101
SELECT customer_id, response_text FROM customer_service_responses ORDER BY response_id DESC
SELECT * FROM predictive_models WHERE accuracy_score > 0.8
SELECT model_name, accuracy_score FROM predictive_models ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_service_responses WHERE response_id = 10 ORDER BY prediction_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT model_name, accuracy_score FROM predictive_models WHERE model_description LIKE '%prediction%' ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC;
SELECT response_text, prediction_score FROM customer_service_responses WHERE customer_id = 25 ORDER BY response_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_data JOIN customer_service_responses ON customer_data.customer_id = customer_service_responses.customer_id WHERE customer_data.email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_service_responses;
SELECT customer_id, response_category, prediction_score FROM customer_service_responses;
SELECT response_text FROM customer_service_responses WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT prediction_score, prediction_accuracy FROM customer_service_responses ORDER BY prediction_accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_name, trained_date FROM prediction_models WHERE training_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM customer_service_responses ORDER BY prediction_accuracy DESC;
SELECT response_text, prediction_score FROM customer_service_responses WHERE response_category = 'Technical Support';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(prediction_accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM customer_service_responses GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(prediction_accuracy) > 0.8;
SELECT p.model_name, COUNT(*) AS num_models FROM prediction_models p JOIN customer_service_responses c ON p.model_id = c.model_id GROUP BY p.model_name;
SELECT c.customer_id, h.total_requests, h.avg_response_time, c.response_category FROM customer_service_responses c JOIN customer_history h ON c.customer_id = h.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_phone, customer_address FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_data WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' AND ticket_priority > 3;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, ticket_status FROM ticket_data ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, ticket_description FROM customer_data INNER JOIN ticket_data ON customer_data.customer_id = ticket_data.customer_id;
SELECT response_text, response_timestamp FROM response_data WHERE response_sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT prediction_text, prediction_confidence FROM prediction_data ORDER BY prediction_confidence DESC;
